response.overview: As the world teeters on the brink of annihilation, Dietrich Bonhoeffer joins a deadly plot to assassinate Hitler, risking his faith and fate to save millions of Jews from genocide.
response.tagline: In an impossible time, it takes impossible courage.
response.title: Bonhoeffer: Pastor. Spy. Assassin

titles.title: A Redenção – A História Real de Bonhoeffer

results.name: 'Bonhoeffer' With Todd Komarnicki, Clarke Peters, and Blu Murray | Academy Conversations
